TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed FormsAuthenticationCredentials extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement
Public NotInheritable Class FormsAuthenticationCredentials Inherits ConfigurationElement

summary.span: 为使用基于表单的身份验证的 ASP.NET 应用程序配置用户凭据。

span.span: Configures user credentials for ASP.NET applications that use form-based authentication.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类使您能够以编程方式访问和修改`credentials`元素`forms`主题中`authentication`配置文件节。The class provides a way to programmatically access and modify the `credentials` element of a `forms` section in the `authentication` section of the configuration file. 此类型是包括的组的一部分、 ，和类型。This type is part of a group that includes the , the , and the types. 除了集合类型中，所有其他直接影响基础的配置标记。With the exception of the collection type, all the others directly affect the underlying configuration tags. > [!NOTE] > 可以将信息写入根据定义的限制的配置文件的相关节。The can write information into the related section of the configuration file according to the restrictions defined by . 在层次结构不允许层次结构中的配置文件中写入任何尝试会对由分析器生成的错误消息中。Any attempt to write in a configuration file at a level not allowed in the hierarchy will result in an error message generated by the parser. 但是，此类可用于读取层次结构中的任何级别的配置信息。However, you can use this class to read configuration information at any level in the hierarchy. 有关安全性和可伸缩性，建议你使用外部存储库，例如数据库、 保留用户的凭据。For safety and scalability, it is recommended that you use an external repository, such as a database, to keep the users' credentials. ## Examples 此示例演示如何以声明方式为的几个特性指定值`credentials`部分中，还可作为的成员访问类。This example demonstrates how to specify values declaratively for several attributes of the `credentials` section, which can also be accessed as members of the class. 下面的配置文件示例演示如何以声明方式为指定值`credentials`部分。The following configuration file example shows how to specify values declaratively for the `credentials` section. ``` ``` > [!NOTE] > 如果你使用`credentials`部分中，请务必遵循在所述的准则[ASP.NET 身份验证](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fc10b0ef-4ce4-4a7f-9174-886325221ee1)。If you use the `credentials` section, be sure to follow the guidelines explained at [ASP.NET Authentication](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fc10b0ef-4ce4-4a7f-9174-886325221ee1). 有关可伸缩性和更高的安全性，建议你使用的外部数据库来存储用户的凭据。For scalability and better security, it is recommended that you use an external database to store the users' credentials. 有关生成安全的 ASP.NET 应用程序的详细信息，搜索 Microsoft MSDN 网站 (http://msdn.microsoft.com)为"保护 ASP.NET 应用程序"和"构建安全的 ASP.NET 应用程序： 身份验证、 授权和安全通信."For more information about building secure ASP.NET applications, search the Microsoft MSDN Web site (http://msdn.microsoft.com) for "Securing Your ASP.NET Application" and "Building Secure ASP.NET Applications: Authentication, Authorization, and Secure Communication." 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationCredentials#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationCredentials/CS/formsauthenticationcredentials.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationCredentials#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationCredentials/VB/formsauthenticationcredentials.vb#1)]
